name: Bulk Shea Nuts
details: OurShea Ghana’s Premium Shea Nuts are handpicked from wild shea trees by women’s cooperatives in the Upper East Region of Ghana. Carefully sun-dried and naturally cleaned, these nuts are ideal for high-yield shea butter extraction and meet strict international standards for cosmetic and food use.

features.Color: Dark brown outer shell; beige to ivory kernel
features.Shelf Life: Up to 12 months under proper storage conditions

benefits: High Oil Yield: Excellent for cosmetic-grade shea butter production.
Naturally Organic: Sourced from wild trees, with no chemical inputs.
Sustainable: Harvested by women’s cooperatives using traditional methods.
Ethical Sourcing: Fair-trade partnerships improve community livelihoods.
Versatile Use: Suitable for cosmetic, food, and pharmaceutical industries.

applications.Cosmetics: Raw material for shea butter used in lotions, balms, soaps, and creams.
applications.Food Industry: Used in confectionery, bakery, and as a cocoa butter substitute.

storage: Store in a cool, dry, well-ventilated area.
Avoid direct sunlight and damp conditions.
Use pallets to prevent contact with floor moisture.

Lead Time: 7–14 days after order confirmation, depending on volume and logistics

specifications.Shelf Life: Up to 12 months under proper storage conditions

name: Bulk Shea Butter
details: Our Premium Organic Shea Butter is a rich, nutrient-dense moisturizer sourced directly from the nuts of the Vitellaria paradoxa tree, native to West Africa. Handcrafted by women's cooperatives using traditional methods and machinery, this unrefined shea butter retains all its natural healing and hydrating properties. It is 100% pure, raw, certified organic, ideal for sensitive skin, hair care, and natural DIY cosmetics.

features.Fair Trade Sourced: Ethically harvested and produced by women's cooperatives in northern Ghana.
features.Cold-Pressed: Maintains maximum potency of vitamins and fatty acids.
features.Multi-Use: Ideal for skin care, hair treatment, stretch mark prevention, baby care, and natural formulations.
features.Rich in Nutrients: Contains vitamins A, E, and F, as well as essential fatty acids that nourish and protect.

benefits: Deeply moisturizes dry and cracked skin
Promotes skin elasticity and reduces the appearance of stretch marks
Strengthens and softens hair, reducing frizz and breakage
Acts as a natural anti-inflammatory and sunscreen (SPF ~6)

specifications.Texture: Smooth and creamy at body temperature; solid at room temperature
specifications.Color: Ivory to light yellow (varies by batch)
specifications.Storage: Keep in a cool, dry place away from sunlight

name: Handcrafted Soaps
details: Our handcrafted soaps are made in small batches using traditional cold process methods and the finest natural ingredients, with a primary focus on premium organic shea butter ethically sourced from West African women’s cooperatives. These luxurious bars gently cleanse the skin while delivering deep hydration and nourishment, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

features.Organic Shea Butter: Rich in vitamins A, E, and F, deeply moisturizes and promotes skin elasticity.
features.Coconut Oil: Adds lather and cleanses without stripping natural oils.
features.Olive Oil: Softens and soothes with antioxidants and fatty acids.
features.Essential Oils & Botanicals: Scented with essential oils and naturally colored for aromatherapy.

benefits: Free from synthetic fragrances, sulfates, parabens, and artificial dyes
Cold-processed for superior quality and integrity
Gentle for daily use on face and body
Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive and dry skin
